items.name: init(property: NSPropertyDescription, collationType: NSFetchIndexElementType)
items.desc: Creates an index element description using the specified property description and collation type.

items.name: var collationType: NSFetchIndexElementType
items.desc: The type of collation that the index element uses, either binary or R-tree.

items.name: var isAscending: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that controls whether an index that supports direction is an ascending or descending index.

items.name: var propertyName: String?
items.desc: The specified name in the property description.
